sentences.en: Aberdeen are nine points adrift of Rangers at the top of the Scottish League.
sentences.cn: 在苏格兰足球联赛中，亚伯丁队比排在首位的流浪者队落后9分。

sentences.en: Amy had the growing sense that she was adrift and isolated.
sentences.cn: 埃米愈发感到自己孤立无援，孑然一身。

sentences.en: He turned his son adrift in a snowstorm.
sentences.cn: 他将儿子逐出家门,让他在暴风雪里四处漂泊.

sentences.en: He was adrift in an open boat for three days.
sentences.cn: 他在一只敞篷船上漂流了三天.

sentences.en: Hearing what he said, I was all adrift.
sentences.cn: 听他这么一说, 我倒糊涂了.

sentences.en: I nearly suffocated when the pipe of my breathing apparatus came adrift.
sentences.cn: 呼吸器上的管子脱落时,我差点给憋死.

sentences.en: In the country the vast electorate was restless and adrift.
sentences.cn: 在国内,广大的选民浮躁不安,旁徨而无所适从.

sentences.en: Peters had been adrift and aimless.
sentences.cn: 彼得斯曾经漫无目的地四处漂泊。

sentences.en: Several of the lifeboats were still afloat a month after being cast adrift .
sentences.cn: 放漂一个月后，有几艘救生艇还在漂流。

sentences.en: She had been cut adrift from everything she had known.
sentences.cn: 她远离了她所熟知的一切.

sentences.en: The fisherman cast off the rope and set the boat adrift.
sentences.cn: 渔夫解开缆绳,让船漂流而去.

sentences.en: The ship was adrift on the high seas.
The survivors were adrift in a lifeboat for six days.
sentences.cn: 幸存者在救生艇上漂流了六天。

sentences.en: They returned to find that someone had cut their boat adrift.
sentences.cn: 他们回来时发现有人切断了缆绳任船在水中漂流.

sentences.en: They were spotted after three hours adrift in a dinghy.
sentences.cn: 他们在小舢板上漂浮了3个小时后才被发现。

sentences.en: Three insulating panels had come adrift from the base of the vehicle.
sentences.cn: 车子底盘的3块隔热板已经脱落了。

trans.tran_cn: 漂泊的，漂浮着的，随波逐流的
trans.tran_en: a boat that is adrift is not fastened to anything or controlled by anyone
